[ti:Simple]
[ar:Florida Georgia Line]
[al:Florida Georgia Line]
[by:]

[00:00.00]Simple - Florida Georgia Line
[00:09.97]The way your fingers fit in mine
[00:12.51]It's five plus five not rocket science
[00:14.86]This day in time that's hard to find
[00:17.31]It's true
[00:19.78]The road we're on ain't a traffic jam
[00:21.94]It's a Sunday drive on a piece of land
[00:24.37]It's paradise as long as I'm with you
[00:27.55]
[00:28.84]It's like one two three
[00:31.23]Just as easy as can be
[00:33.68]Just the way you look at me
[00:35.83]You make me smile
[00:37.22]
[00:38.41]Ain't no need to complicate it we both know that's overrated
[00:43.24]We've been there it's safe to say it ain't our style
[00:46.91]
[00:47.77]It's just that simple S I M P L E
[00:51.10]Simple as can be
[00:52.54]It's just that simple S I M P L E
[00:55.82]Simple as can be
[00:58.00]We used to live on instagram
[01:00.43]Worry 'bout who all gives a d**n
[01:02.74]'Bout where we've been and where we ended up
[01:05.92]
[01:07.47]Then I met you and you met me
[01:10.02]And all the rest is history an epiphany
[01:13.56]That all we need is us
[01:15.69]
[01:16.87]It's like one two three
[01:19.23]Just as easy as can be
[01:21.63]Just the way you look at me
[01:23.81]You make me smile
[01:25.28]

[01:31.28]We've been there it's safe to say it ain't our style
[01:34.81]
[01:35.92]We're just simple like a six string
[01:38.84]The way this world was meant to be
[01:41.19]Like laughin' love make a lot out of a little
[01:44.45]
[01:45.24]It's just that simple S I M P L E
[01:48.63]Simple as can be
[01:50.25]It's just that simple S I M P L E
[01:53.47]Simple as can be
[01:55.15]

data.trans:
[ti:Simple]
[ar:Florida Georgia Line]
[al:Florida Georgia Line]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:09.97]你我十指紧扣 如此和谐
[00:12.51]握住彼此双手 并不困难
[00:14.86]就是这一天 很难才能发现
[00:17.31]这是真的
[00:19.78]我们走的这条路并不拥挤
[00:21.94]星期天 我们行驶在这片土地上
[00:24.37]只要和你在一起 这里就是天堂
[00:27.55]
[00:28.84]数着一二三
[00:31.23]就是这么容易
[00:33.68]你看着我的眼神
[00:35.83]你让我露出微笑
[00:37.22]
[00:38.41]不必太过复杂 我们知道一切都被高估了
[00:43.24]我们曾经历过 可以说这不是我们的风格
[00:46.91]
[00:47.77]就是这么简单 简单
[00:51.10]尽可能简单一点
[00:52.54]就是这么简单 简单
[00:55.82]尽可能简单一点
[00:58.00]我们曾沉迷于Instagram
[01:00.43]总是担心别人的眼光和视线
[01:02.74]关心我们去过哪里 经历过什么
[01:05.92]
[01:07.47]直到我和你相遇
[01:10.02]其他一切都变成过去 我突然顿悟
[01:13.56]我们需要的只有彼此
[01:15.69]
[01:16.87]数着一二三
[01:19.23]就是这么容易
[01:21.63]你看着我的眼神
[01:23.81]你让我露出微笑
[01:25.28]
[01:26.29]不必太过复杂 我们知道一切都被高估了
[01:31.28]我们曾经历过 可以说这不是我们的风格
[01:34.81]
[01:35.92]我们就像六弦吉他一样简单
[01:38.84]这世界原本就该是这样
[01:41.19]欢笑与爱情 从点点滴滴积累而来
[01:44.45]
[01:45.24]就是这么简单 简单
[01:48.63]尽可能简单一点
